name: Auto Filter Bot
description: Kind of a filter bot where you don't have to add filters manually.

WEBHOOK.description: No need to change this field!

API_HASH.description: Your API Hash from my.telegram.org or @UseTGXBot

APP_ID.description: Your APP ID from my.telegram.org or @UseTGXBot

TG_USER_SESSION.description: A pyrogram user session string. Generate from https://repl.it/@prgofficial/String-Gen

AUTH_USERS.description: ID of users that can use the bot commands

DATABASE_NAME.description: Your database name from mongoDB. ( Default will 'Cluster0' )

DATABASE_NAME2.description: Your database name from mongoDB. ( Default will 'Cluster0' )

DOC_SEARCH.description: Should bot search for document files in channels ( Give 'yes' or 'no' )

VID_SEARCH.description: Should bot search for video files in channels ( Give 'yes' or 'no' )

MUSIC_SEARCH.description: Should bot search for music files in channels ( Give 'yes' or 'no' )

SAVE_USER.description: Do you need to save user details? Usefull for getting userinfo and total user counts. May reduce filter capacity. Give yes or no

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: To check dyno status. Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API
